text: @ChristinaKTLA @GavinNewsom It should come as no surprise, that the recent spike in positive COVID-19 cases, 18-49 ages, has come from protest events the month of June. These are a massive Petri dish for CV-19 transmission. Along w/bars & nightclubs, no social distancing & inconsistent wearing of masks.
